title: 1912 T202 Hassan Triple Folder- with Lajoie- for sale
author: Ed_Hutchinson

posts.post_title: 1912 T202 Hassan Triple Folder- with Lajoie- for sale
posts.post_content:
The end panels are Rucker and Bergen, both of Brooklyn. The middle piece is "A Great Batsman" Featuring Lajoie.

Card would be VG if not for a small tear in the center piece on the top.

Asking 40 shipped- if interested I will happily send over photos!
